title: Helmort : The Story That Inspired 'Dracula'...
description: July, 1890 For twenty years, Doctor Erik Binson has hidden himself away in a private asylum outside Whitby Bay, England. Now Abraham Stoker has sought him out to deliver a letter from a mutual acquaintance - a man Erik hasn't seen since 1870. Inspired by what he heard that night, Mr. Stoker published his gothic masterpiece, 'Dracula', seven years later... (This is a full-length novel, approximately 80,000 words.)
author: K.V. Witten
